title: The Science of Gifting and Getting Mentors w/ John Ruhlin
itunes:title: The Science of Gifting and Getting Mentors w/ John Ruhlin
description:
Episode 185 - John Ruhlin is the #1 Cutco Sales Representative in the 70 year history of the company. He has used gifting as a way to make massive sales as well as get massively influential mentors. In this episode we talk about the science of gift giving as well as how to get great mentors in the process.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
